website_summaries.verdict: This simple slackline kit is cheaper than most competitors, making it a good way to try out the hobby.
pros: For the price, it's hard to go wrong with this 48-foot long slackline
This inexpensive set is great for those trying out the sport
cons: The ratchet is of low quality and can be difficult to unlock
Beginners may find this slackline challenging without a training line

customer_reviews.title: Super duper fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I purchased it for my 4 year old granddaughter who is practicing to join the circus when she grows up. She has spent hours practicing in the back yard. My son who is 250 lbs. Loves this product also. He is in a very intense college program and has tried yoga, meditation and other methods of clearing his mind. When he gets on the slack line, I can see the stress literally leave his body. He has lost 2 inches off his waist in just 2 weeks. GREAT FUN FOR THE MIND AND BODY! great job for making an affordable, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy but very similar to car straps.
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure of the difference (maybe the weight it can hold) but I received these and they are very similar to my truck straps. These are heavy, well built and sturdy!! I didnt want a slackline coming apart with my children on it so I was going back and forth trying to find the best one for my money but this slack line definately holds up! Its definately worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RatingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 7 year old and twin 6 year old children. They LOVE it!! It is not easy and will definitely take some practice but it is so much fun! The directions for set-up are simple, clear and easy to understand. The product is well made and appears to be extremely sturdy. Both my husband and I have used it and it is great! We highly recommend this product and this company. The company has reached out to us to follow-up to confirm that we were able to install the product properly. Great customer service. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: CMCL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The slack line we bought from you is a very well made item with the heavy duty ratchet. The price was truly right on target with the big box stores. The instructions were ok. The only thing that I would say in trying to improve your item is to put some sort of reinforced sleeve on both ends where it wraps around the tree to avoid the fraying I experienced in mine. Hope that won't reduce the longevity of this
customer_reviews.author: guesswho

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise for kids, and most all kids love the challenge of it. Adults love it too! Great for your core. Good, clean fun, and not dangerous or an activity that is injury prone. I gave one to my neighbors who have a lot of young kids, and it is mounted low so even the littles can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Begley

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!  Makes backyard fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband install this in 5 minutes. My kids age: 13 9 7 and 4 year old all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Patierno

customer_reviews.title: Balancing already
customer_reviews.text: This slack line will be a good investment for some time. it's sturdy, so I feel like my grandkids are safe on it. And though at first they didn't see how they could possibly walk on it, now after only 4 days, they are able to take a few steps before the loose their balance. I found a video (maybe in the feedback section) that showed how kids were able to walk it and this gave my kids some understanding. The most difficult for me was that I am not familiar with the ratchet mechanism so it took me a while to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: Great balancing practice
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a piece of an "American Ninja Course" we put together for our daughters. They love the challenge of walking on it, and we were pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to put up or adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: Really well made product. My kids are really enjoying it! Very easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: We had a family of young kids over last night and had a blast-- they had a good time trying to walk on the line-and will be ...
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying the Slackline! We had a family of young kids over last night and had a blast-- they had a good time trying to walk on the line-and will be coming back for another try on it. We only had one tree so tied it to the bucket of the tractor, worked good. Now I know more about it we will be able to use it easier -- great grand kids coming over the memorial day week end -- should be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Currit

customer_reviews.title: Love my slack line
customer_reviews.text: Love my slack line. Used it today for the first time and its super sturdy and durable. Coming in at 225lbs, I'm a big dude to get on one of these but its able to support me even at the distances used. I'd recommend this slackline as a great beginner slackline or even advanced!
customer_reviews.author: Aja Barto

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality.. We just opened and used once and the kids had so much fun.. Hoping we can set up often to the point WHR they can do it without help. I got 2 sets hoping we can gift one to friends however they being in a HOA setting poses doubts now.
customer_reviews.author: sanimej

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (8 and 10 yrs) really like this! Its not easy... which makes them love it that much more. I had to put a rope parallel about 5 ft above the slackline, from the same two trees, so the kids could have something to guide them. Its like a crutch. Maybe they'll get better and wont need it eventually but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 boys have spent many hours already climbing, bouncing and putting this thing through a workout. Easy enough to assemble, bear in mind the tree trunks dimensions when estimating the length of the line. We've attached a higher rope above the line to help with balance until we've built up some confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Lalalive

customer_reviews.title: Great Slackline!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Excellent product! My husband and kids have had a blast putting it up in our front yard and at the park during the boys' parkour class. Super easy setup. Quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I YouTubed how to set it up. I had a friend that had one of these and we use it ever year for our company picnic. It's faster to setup with two people but I did it on my own. Kids and adults will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian2020

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, fun and exercise for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: The slackline was easy and quick to set up, and is providing fun, challenge, and exercise for the whole family! We are lining up to take turns, even the parents! The product is strong and well made. Great birthday present for a kid who loves American Ninja Warrior!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Clickner

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up, the picture is very accurate as to width, we used it as an activity with our youth group at church and they loved it. It is very difficult, so none of them were willing to spend much time on it, but it was a lot of fun to try! Worth the cost! It is very sturdy, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: P. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this product! Came with complete instructions and great email welcome from the company. Kids love this, and I'm using it as an obstacle for my 7 year old's American Ninja Warrior-themed birthday party. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Danica Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I got the slackline for my 6 year old granddaughter on her birthday. It was a total success! She and her friend loved it. Also her two year old brother enjoys it. He bounces on it,though. I bought two slacklines and placed the second one over their heads so they could hold on to it...It worked. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BBQ and balancing
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a great party favor at BBQs, entertaining adults and children alike. If only the kit came with an over-the-head rope to hang on to until balance improves, that have sealed this product with a five-star. I'm sure a thin rope is affordable and easy to find, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzieim

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday. It arrived very quickly, is very sturdy and she can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Goodtimes by Goodtimes
customer_reviews.text: The Slackline was made of very strong material and everything was as promoted. It is a great product, especially for the price. The company has an excellent returns policy, also. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving the slackline. It's harder to balance on than we thought it would be. My children aren't allowed to stand on it, but that's fine; there are many fun trick tutorials on YouTube that don't involve standing. The slackline appears to be well-made and set up was easy. I did have to buy an additional tow strap to fit around our large trees, so my only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is due to the ratchet strap being too short.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni813

customer_reviews.title: As described but doesn’t stay flat near tree, this ...
customer_reviews.text: As described but doesn’t stay flat near tree, this is first purchase of this type of product so nothing to compare to.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty K

customer_reviews.title: A hit at parties!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for children! It keeps them entertained for hours and improves there balance. I would recommend getting two, one for the top line and one for the bottom. They can hold on to the top line while balancing on the bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and well-made. Bought this for my nephew for Christmas and we all tried it out. It was easy to set up between two trees and the kids had a blast. Slacklining is a lot harder than it looks, but the kids had fun and it's great exercise! Even the adults tried it and the line held up well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Shigeta

customer_reviews.title: Great for gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: My girls, and my husband, love this! Brought it to a 4th of July party and it was a hit there, too!
customer_reviews.author: Teach4u333

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids are having a fun time with the Slackline.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly! This will be a Christmas present so ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! This will be a Christmas present so I can't say how well it holds up, but I am excited for them to use it!
customer_reviews.author: 4lilmonsters

customer_reviews.title: fun for kids and parents
customer_reviews.text: This was a HIT with our kids ages 4-7 and also for the parents! HIGHLY recommend getting the training rope that runs above the slack line and allows you to hold on-(Xtra: Add-On Helpline) - this was great for the kids (and adults). This easily supported up to 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mama E

customer_reviews.title: Fun slackline. Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fun slackline. Great for the price. It was easy to set up and take down. My daughters have been enjoying it. It will get a lot more use once the temps warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Will grow with them.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Kids were playing in minutes. I bought two. One for their feet and another for their hands as a safety line. This toy will grow with them as I can add attachments to hang from overhead with carabiners. Girls are ages 3, 5, and 7 and they love walking the tight rope.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks good. I got it for my 10 year for Christmas and hopefully we can try it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: mshellybird

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10, 8 and 6 year old are having a ball with this slackline. It seems to be very well made and it was easy to set up. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JayDee23

customer_reviews.title: Even my 3 and 4 year Olds loved trying it out
customer_reviews.text: Tried out the slackline before giving as a gift. Even my 3 and 4 year Olds loved trying it out! Good quality, although some of the markings (logo and line)were starting to peel off after one use it does not effect usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We just got our slack line and my kids love it! Super fast shipping!! The only problem is now I need to order 2 more for my other kids. I highly recommend Giidtines Slacklines and will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Spurlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a city back yard or suburbs
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to get the kids out on this! We purchased ground anchors and small saw horses to secure it since we have no trees. Perfect size for a city back yard or suburbs!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Slackline perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our use, strung between two trees over a swimming hole in the mountains! Was easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: kowanalynn

customer_reviews.title: Best summer purchase this year!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this slack line. We have never used one before, it’s easy to set up and use. Packs away nicely when we are done. I love it and so do my children!
customer_reviews.author: Kaethe Banfield

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The slackline is very sturdy and a quality product. My only wish is that you sold a more comprehensive beginner kit with the overhead line and tree protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy; it keeps him entertained for hours and it's good exercise. Great product and great service from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old twins got this for their birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old twins got this for their birthday. We also got a jungle gym slackline. We put the jungle gym one above this balance beam one and have a winning combo! They can balance for themselves and they didn't get off of it for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Sturts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set and user friendly but the actual slacking ...
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids are loving our new hobby!!! Easy to set and user friendly but the actual slacking very challenging to master- that’s the charm of it I guess! Can highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Karell

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product. Easy to install and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. Seems to be a good product. Easy to install and reasonably priced

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's exceeded our expectations and was the centerpiece of our daughter's birthday party today! The slack line is easy to set up and the length is long enough to give us several options in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: Came as described and quickly. Our son loves his ...
customer_reviews.text: Came as described and quickly. Our son loves his new tight rope and anxiously runs outside to use it after school everyday. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Good fun.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this and adults and children loved it. Only used one time, so will update if anything changes.

customer_reviews.title: Great skill building!
customer_reviews.text: In addition to skill building, it is great fun for the kiddos! The kids love it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Easy to setup! Spent hours outside in the woods. Love the slack line!

customer_reviews.title: This thing takes some practice! My daughter seems really ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes some practice! My daughter seems really interested even though she hasn't quite got it yet solo.

customer_reviews.title: A real hit.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my granddaughter age 12 who is involved in gymnastics. She was delighted with the slack line and is excited to learn to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great option to paying a premium for a "brand name" version.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Showed up promptly, good quality and easy to use. As advertised, the kids were set up and having a good time in the back yard within ten minutes or less. Definitely $40 worth of fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality, well packaged, easy to set up. Its good exercise and difficult to master!!

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one as a gift that we only just gave. Excited to hear. Our boys are bigger and our yard required a longer one but they love the slack line!

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! Very fun, easy to put together and great quality.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Very easy to install and simple to read instructions. My daughter wanted one for home because her school has them all over campus for kids to use during their breaks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up between two trees in their backyard
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up between two trees in their backyard. It was a challenge and they were on it all their spare time.

customer_reviews.title: Slack line success
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the slack line as a training tool for Nordic ski racing!! I love it!! I can't wait to start!

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and we like the color - not a bright blue, but somewhat subtle with a satiny light bluish-grey finish! It was also quite simple to put up! Kids are having so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great slackline
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves the slackline. Easy to set up. Very happy with the slackline.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very sturdy product, not too much extra packaging, highly recommend! We got 2 so our kids could hold onto one!

customer_reviews.text: Item came just as described. Great product and great price!

customer_reviews.text: easy set up and take down, clear instructions and goodtimes guaranteed with this slackline!! ;)

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to set up with simple directions. My 4 and 5 year old are using it all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Directions are brief. I couldn't get line tight enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Directions are brief. I couldn't get line tight enough and I had difficulty releasing line.
customer_reviews.author: TOM G

customer_reviews.title: Timely and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a timely manner, product looks to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Asher

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this for my 8 yr old for the back yard. I thought it seemed like a unique and fun thing and I was trying to make the backyard more exciting and for him & friends to play in. It's a very well made, good quality product. Definitely worth the money in that respect. But for some reason it didn't excite him. It only keeps him & his friends entertained for a very short period of time then they get bored of it. I guess it just depends on the kids!
customer_reviews.author: BlueMamba

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to use it, but NO instruction sheet anywhere on the box or in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Ralfs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just what I was looking for. I'm new to slacklining; got one for me and one for a gift, the whole family loves to play with it. Will buy again for future gifts!
customer_reviews.author: lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why this is on sale. The ratchet is not worth the original price of $79 I had no problems with the installation however when I tried to undo the ratchet it wouldn't unlock and I didn't even tighten the line much. I even had to use gloves to unlock it because the metal cuts into your hand. If I want to move it I have to cut the line. The ratchet is a very cheap version of the Ninja line......Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph C

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and instant fun
customer_reviews.text: This Slackline is a perfect start for our 6 year old twins! Easy to install and instant fun!

customer_reviews.title: Snow so have not setup yet Great quality.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Quality material. Fun for the entire family for a reasonable price.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the kids! Well made and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lacombe

customer_reviews.title: the line and ratchet seem to be great quality.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had the slackline very long and I would give a 5 star rating, with the exception of the fact that we are beginners and the instructional diagram that came with it was not enough. Being new, I felt an instructional video of using the ratchet, especially the release. I ended up getting my thumb pinched by trial and error. It shows the release in the picture to release until the line pops loose, but a video would have prevented a lot of anxiety. So far, the line and ratchet seem to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. easy to set up and take down.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but short
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend getting a longer one. Also the pet that wraps around tree does not work well with large trees. Had to find thinner tree to wrap it around. Would be nice if it came with carrying case because box is falling apart already and I have to lug box around when I need to take it somewhere.

product_meta.title: Beginner Slackline by Goodtimes - 48' Long and 2" Wide Extra Soft Nylon Webbing W/ Durable Safety Ratchet + Easy Slacklines Set Up Guide. The Best Slacklining Gift Kit. Great for Kids Adults Teens
feature_bullets: **SAVE $5 WHEN YOU BUY 2. GIVE ONE TO A FRIEND OR USE ONE AS AN OVERHEAD TRAINING LINE TO HANG ON TO. *** USE COUPON CODE "C3A8EALT" AT CHECKOUT.***

EASY TO SET UP SLACKLINE – Each Goodtimes Slackline comes with an easy to read one page set up guide complete with pictures for quick and safe set up. Average time from opening the box to kids on the line is under 10 minutes.

GREAT ACTIVITY THAT REQUIRES NO ELECTRICITY- Goodtimes Slacklines are sure to get your kids off the couch and rediscover the outdoor fun. Slacklining is a great physical activity that promotes hand/eye coordination, balance, and creativity. Great for use as a yoga slackline.

CUSTOMED DESIGNED TRAMPOLINE STYLE WEBBING – Goodtimes Slacklines are uniquely designed for the beginner and intermediate slackliner. The special webbing promotes stability and the perfect amount of spring to create the ideal combination of safety and fun.
“GOODTIMES” FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY- Great activity for all ages. Perfect for family reunions, camping, picnics, birthday parties, barbeques, at the beach, parks, and in your own backyard.

SET INCLUDES: Cool powder blue slackline that Is 48 feet long and 2 inches wide. Comes with durable, safety ratchet, an easy One Page Set up Guide, and Durable Storage Box. Everything you need for a Fun Outdoor Balance Activity.
